Service Details: - Conducts investigations into all officer-related incidents that result in death or serious harm in order to determine whether or not an officer may have committed an offence- Incidents of serious harm include:  injury that may result in death, may cause serious disfigurement, may cause substantial loss or impairment of mobility of the body as a whole or of the function of any limb or organ
Address & Map: Independent Investigations Office of BC13450 102nd Ave, 12th FlrSurrey, BC     V3T 5X3
